identity.mission: Create a professional, high-frequency trading (HFT) terminal for Solana. Eliminate generic SaaS aesthetics. Prioritize data density, speed, and 'Dark Mode' tactical visuals.
identity.vibe: Bloomberg Terminal meets Cyberpunk. Deep blacks, electric neons, rigid grids, zero fluff.
principles: Speed is Feature #1: Visuals must imply low latency.
Density over Whitespace: Professional traders need data, not breathing room.
Contrast is King: Neon on Black for maximum readability.
No Rounded Corners: Sharp edges = Precision.

mono.name: JetBrains Mono
mono.usage: All Data, Numbers, Prices, Logs, Code, Input Fields

rules: Data values must always use the Mono font.

layout_strategy.container_style: Full width, fixed height (100vh) for main trading screen. Scrollable only within panels.
layout_strategy.responsive: Desktop First. Mobile view stacks panels vertically.

button.classes: font-mono font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-xs border border-border transition-all active:scale-95

input.classes: bg-black border-zinc-800 font-mono focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary

table.header_classes: h-8 px-2 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-wider text-[10px]

badge.classes: font-mono text-[10px] uppercase tracking-widest border-current bg-transparent

visual_enhancers.live_indicator: Pulsing w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-primary animate-pulse

auth.layout: Centered Card on Abstract Grid Background

control.right_panel: Bot Status, Start/Stop Big Button, Simulation Toggle

instructions_to_main_agent.components: Shadcn UI (Customize to remove rounded corners)
instructions_to_main_agent.state: Use React Context or Zustand (if available) for Bot State
instructions_to_main_agent.critical_rule: DO NOT use 'rounded-lg', 'rounded-xl'. Force 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' in tailwind config or overrides.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons (e.g., 'start-bot-btn', 'rpc-input')
